parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DO.SPDEVID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined identifier for the device. It must be unique for each tracked unit of the device under study, and can be at whatever level of granularity the device should be identified (e.g., model or serial number, combination of identifiers).
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor Device Identifier
datasetVariables.name: SPDEVID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DO.DOSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence Number given to ensure uniqueness of device records within subject records within a domain. May be any valid number. It should be unique within every subject/device combination.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: DOSEQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DO.DOGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a block of related records in a single domain for a device.
datasetVariables.label: Group ID
datasetVariables.name: DOGRPID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DO.DOREFID

datasetVariables.description: Internal or external identifier. This could be a scan code or equivalent.
datasetVariables.label: Reference ID
datasetVariables.name: DOREFID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DO.DOSPID

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C111111

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test, or Exam

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DO.DOTESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the measurement, test, or examination described in DOTEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in DOTESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST"). DOTESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. Examples: "SHLFLIFE", "INDC", "COMPOS".
datasetVariables.label: Device Property Short Name
datasetVariables.name: DOTESTCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C111112

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test, or Exam

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DO.DOTEST

datasetVariables.description: Verbatim name of the test or examination used to obtain the measurement or finding. The value in DOTEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. Examples: "Shelf Life", "Indication for use", "Composition" (of device).
datasetVariables.label: Device Property Test Name
datasetVariables.name: DOTEST

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DO.DOCAT

datasetVariables.description: Defines a category of related records. For example, it can be used to define the type of property being defined, such as "DIMENSIONS" versus "MATERIAL".
datasetVariables.label: Category for Device In-Use
datasetVariables.name: DOCAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DO.DOSCAT

datasetVariables.description: A further categorization of a measurement or examination. For example, if DOCAT = "DIMENSION", DOSCAT might be "LENGTH" or "WIDTH" or "THICKNESS".
datasetVariables.label: Subcategory for Device In-Use
datasetVariables.name: DOSCAT

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

priorVersion.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DO.DOORRES

self.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

datasetVariables.description: Result of the Device Property as originally observed or collected. DOORRES should contain the result or value of the property defined in DOTEST. For example, if DOTEST is LIFE (shelf life), then DOORRES might be 6 (months).
datasetVariables.label: Result or Finding in Original Units
datasetVariables.name: DOORRES

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DO.DOORRESU

datasetVariables.description: Original units in which the data were collected. The unit for DOORRES. Examples: "MONTHS", "cm".
datasetVariables.label: Original Units
datasetVariables.name: DOORRESU

description: A findings domain that contains the device characteristics that do not vary over the course of the study. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102619, 2018-06-29)
label: Device Properties
name: DO
